title: Confidence Mothiba
text: Confidence Mothiba is a Data Scientist, Software Developer, and Project Manager with a strong focus on healthcare-related initiatives. With a passion for innovation, Confidence builds and enhances data platforms that drive impactful decision-making. Beyond technical work, Confidence is deeply committed to supporting health science research—providing guidance and collaboration to data analysts and researchers alike.
